table.beforeMigrateExecOnDest: alter table scgroup modify groupname varchar(200)
table.checkExistQuery: select id from scgroup where id=:id
table.existSQL: update scgroup set ID=:ID ,GroupName=':GroupName' ,IsParliamentRegistrar=:IsParliamentRegistrar ,IsLawRegistrar=:IsLawRegistrar ,IsRegulationRegistrar=:IsRegulationRegistrar ,IsOpinionRegistrar=:IsOpinionRegistrar ,IsPersonalOpinionRegistrar=:IsPersonalOpinionRegistrar ,F_CMOrganizationID=:F_CMOrganizationID where id=:id
